Verses: 1 aagaiyaal, Matravargalaik Kutravaaliyaagath Theerkkiravane, Nee Yaaraanaalum Sari, Pokkuchsolla Unakku Idamillai; Nee Kutramaagath Theerkkiravaigal Evaigalo, Avaigalai Neeye Seygirapadiyaal, Nee Matravargalaikkuriththuch Sollugira Theerppinaale Unnaiththaane Kutravaaliyaagath Theerkkiraai.
2 ippadippattavaigalai Seygiravargalukkuth Dhevanudaiya Niyaayaththeerppu Saththiyaththinpadiye Irukkiradhendru Arindhirukkirom.
3 ippadippattavaigalai Seygiravargalaik Kutravaaligalendru Theerththum, Avaigalaiye Seygiravane, Nee Dhevanudaiya Niyaayaththeerppukkuth Thappikkollalaamendru Ninaikkiraayaa?
4 alladhu Dhevadhayavu Nee Gunappadumpadi Unnai Evugiradhendru Ariyaamal, Avarudaiya Dhayavu Porumai Neediyasaandham Ivaigalin Aisuvariyaththai Asattaipannugiraayo?
5 un Manakkadinaththirkum Gunappadaadha Irudhayaththirkum Etrapadi, Dhevanudaiya Needhiyulla Theerppu Velippadum Kobaakkinainaalile Unakkaagak Kobaakkinaiyaik Kuviththukkollugiraaye.
6 dhevan Avanavanudaiya Kiriyaigalukkuththakkadhaai Avanavanukkup Balanalippaar.
7 sorndhupogaamal Narkiriyaigalaich Seydhu, Magimaiyaiyum Ganaththaiyum Azhiyaamaiyaiyum Thedugiravargalukku Niththiyajeevanai Alippaar.
8 sandaikkaararaayirundhu, Saththiyaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaamal, Aniyaayaththirkuk Keezhppadindhirukkiravargalukko Ukkirakobaakkinai Varum.
9 munbu Yoodharilum Pinbu Girekkarilum Pollaanguseygira Endha Manusha Aaththumaavukkum Ubaththiravamum Viyaagulamum Undaagum.
10 munbu Yoodharilum Pinbu Girekkarilum Evan Nanmaiseygiraano Avanukku Magimaiyum Ganamum Samaadhaanamum Undaagum.
11 dhevanidaththil Patchapaadhamillai.

12 evargal Niyaayappiramaanamillaamal Paavanjseygiraargalo, Avargal Niyaayappiramaanamillaamal Kettuppovaargal; Evargal Niyaayappiramaanaththukkutpattavargalaaip Paavanjseygiraargalo, Avargal Niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Aakkinaiththeerppadaivaargal.
13 niyaayappiramaanaththaik Ketkiravargal Dhevanukku Munbaaga Needhimaangalalla, Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Seygiravargale Needhimaangalaakkappaduvaargal.

14 andriyum Niyaayappiramaanamillaadha Purajaadhigal Subaavamaai Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Seygirapodhu, Niyaayappiramaanamillaadha Avargal Thangalukkuth Thaangale Niyaayappiramaanamaayirukkiraargal.

15 avargaludaiya Manasaatchiyum Kooda Saatchiyidugiradhinaalum, Kutramundu Kutramillaiyendru Avargaludaiya Sindhanaigal Ondraiyondru Theerkkiradhinaalum, Niyaayappiramaanaththirkketra Kiriyai Thangal Irudhayangalil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhendru Kaanbikkiraargal.
16 en Suviseshaththinpadiye, Dhevan Yesukiristhuvaikkondu Manusharudaiya Andharangangalaikkuriththu Niyaayaththeerppukkodukkum Naalile Idhu Vilangum.
17 nee Yoodhanendru Peyarpetru, Niyaayappiramaanaththinmel Patrudhalaayirundhu, Dhevanaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraatti,
18 niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Ubadhesikkappattavanaai, Avarudaiya Siththaththai Arindhu, Nanmai Theemai Innadhendru Vagaiyarukkiraaye.
19 nee Unnaik Kurudarukku Vazhikaattiyaagavum, Andhagaaraththilullavargalukku Velichchamaagavum,
20 pedhaigalukkup Podhaganaagavum, Kuzhandhaigalukku Ubaaththiyaayanaagavum, Niyaayappiramaanaththin Arivaiyum Saththiyaththaiyum Kaattiya Sattamudaiyavanaagavum Ennugiraaye.
21 ippadiyirukka, Matravanukkup Podhikkira Nee Unakkuththaane Podhiyaamalirukkalaamaa? Kalavuseyyakkoodaadhendru Pirasangikkira Nee Kalavuseyyalaamaa?
22 vibachaaram Seyyakkoodaadhendru Sollugira Nee Vibachaaram Seyyalaamaa? Vikkiragangalai Aruvarukkira Nee Kovilgalaik Kollaiyidalaamaa?
23 niyaayappiramaanaththaik Kuriththu Menmaipaaraattugira Nee Niyaayappiramaanaththai Meerinadandhu, Dhevanaik Ganaveenampannalaamaa?
24 ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Dhevanudaiya Naamam Purajaadhigalukkulle Ungal Moolamaaith Dhooshikkappadugiradhe.
25 nee Niyaayappiramaanaththaik Kaikkondu Nadandhaal Viruththasedhanam Pirayojanamulladhudhaan; Nee Niyaayappiramaanaththai Meeri Nadandhaal Un Viruththasedhanam Viruththasedhanamillaamaiyaayitre.
26 melum Viruththasedhanamillaadhavan Niyaayappiramaanaththukketra Needhigalaik Kaikkondaal, Avanudaiya Viruththasedhanamillaamai Viruththasedhanam Endrennappadumallavaa?

27 subaavaththinpadi Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanaayirundhum Niyaayappiramaanaththai Niraivetrugiravanaayirundhaal, Avan Vedha Ezhuththum Viruththasedhanamum Ullavanaayirundhum, Niyaayappiramaanaththai Meerugira Unnaik Kutrappaduththuvaanallavaa?
28 aadhalaal Purambaaga Yoodhanaanavan Yoodhanalla, Purambaaga Maamsaththil Seyyappadum Viruththasedhanamum Viruththasedhanamalla.

29 ullaththile Yoodhanaanavane Yoodhan; Ezhuththinpadi Undaagaamal, Aaviyinpadi Irudhayaththil Undaagum Viruththasedhaname Viruththasedhanam; Ippadippattavanukkuriya Pugazhchchi Manusharaale Alla, Dhevanaale Undaayirukkiradhu.
